transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha sir, good morning. Kaise hain?
Customer: Good morning ji. Badhiya badhiya sir.
Executive: Sarvesh baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Ha ha boliye sir. 
Executive: Ha ha actually ek message aaya tha sir badhiya hai sir Saturday ko sir off tha hamara actually baat nahi ho payi. Kya issue aa raha hai sir bataiye thoda sa matlab service vagera mein to maine sara agar baat karu quality score vagera. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Service ka to koi abhi ek inquiry aayi thi buddhi ki unko bhi wo chahiye tha wo galti se wo upload ho gayi thi IndiaMART se. 
Executive: Matlab buyer jo the matlab galti se upload kiye the.
Customer: Ha. 
Executive: Achcha. 
Customer: Inquiry to hai nahi. Main isliye phone kar raha tha sir ek na party hai Ludhiana ki Vyas Bottling karke. 
Executive: Ha ha. 
Customer: Ye party IndiaMART pe hai IndiaMART se hi hame wo mila tha inka reference. 
Executive: Achcha. 
Customer: Ab ye party payment nahi kar rahi hai. Matlab material le liya inhone payment nahi kari. To inka number chahiye tha ye IndiaMART se bhi connection nahi ho pa rahe hai matlab call nahi utha rahe hai. 
Executive: Ha ha. 
Customer: Inka number chahiye tha sir. 
Executive: Ye matlab inse deal hui hai aapki? 
Customer: Hanji. 
Executive: Inse deal hui hai payment ke liye? 
Customer: Ha ha material ja chuka hai. Aur ek bar sir unka ek bar naam bataiye to kaun si company mein search kar lu line thoda sa bata dijiye. 
Customer: Vyas B E A S B E A S Vyas. 
Executive: Ha Vyas Vyas bolte hain hum log. Aur Bottling Vyas Bottling Solution. 
Customer: Hanji sir. 
Executive: Private Limited? 
Customer: Hanji Ludhiana ke paas hai. 
Executive: Ye Samrala ki company hai kya? 
Customer: Ha Samrala bhi jana padta hai last mein iska GST number batau sir? 
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ek second. C I C1 Z P hai last. 
Executive: Ek second. Ye C1 C1 Z P hai na apna? 
Customer: Hanji hanji. 
Executive: Achcha Vyas Bottling Solution Private Limited ye hai Village Garhi Tarkhana Garhi aise karke hai Samrala Ludhiana Punjab ki. 
Customer: Hanji hanji sir. 
Executive: Achcha achcha to ye matlab kya time tha inka sir matlab kab kab aapse baat hui thi matlab kab aapne material vagera sara inke paas pahunch gaya hai? 
Customer: 15 se 20 din ho gaye sir material pahunche hue. Na to ye phone utha rahe hain. Hmm. Na IndiaMART se call attend kar rahe hain matlab. Sir achcha. Wahi hai matlab ek bar agar ho sakta hai to aap dijiye number nahi to hum. 
Executive: Nahi nahi main ek bar na inka ek bar number bhi unka aapke paas nahi hai kya? 
Customer: Jo number hai wo attend hi nahi kar rahe na ye. Utha hi nahi rahe phone. 
Executive: Achcha achcha ek second hold on. Inka number aapke paas kaun sa hai matlab jo matlab number inke matlab aapke paas jo tha matlab ek bar bata dijiye mujhe. 
Customer: Ek minute sir. Ha phone dijiye apna thoda sa. Inka number hai 98760 09436. 
Executive: Ek second bataiye ek second bas boliye sir. 
Customer: 98. 
Executive: 98. 76. 7600. 0094. Ye to number isme add nahi hai main aapko ek number deta hu. 
Customer: Hanji. Kyunki yaha pe add inka hai ye likhiye 94170. 
Executive: 94. 170. 170. 32. 32. 6. 73. 
Customer: Hanji ye kiska hai? 
Executive: Ye jo company hai na yaha pe inka number yaha pe add hai. Thik hai? 
Customer: Thik hai. Naam vam to isme mention nahi hai but ye number hai ispe call karke baat kariye aur hamari buyer supply jo team hoti hai na usse main unse main aapka baat karata hu ki main unko mail karta hu kyuki jo hamara conflict agar hota hai na buyer supplier ka ya fir jo bhi material issue ya fir payment issue ka to hamari jo buyer supplier jo conflict ka team hoti hai na IndiaMART ki wahi to handle karti hai buyer se baat karaye ki aapko buyer ka matlab aapke paas sara document transaction vagera sab hai na matlab kya cheez hai so billing vagera ka sara kuch. 
Customer: Ha ha sab kuch sab kuch. 
Executive: Kyuki last time bhi ek aise hi hua tha to IndiaMART ne hamari payment wo karwa di thi dilwa di thi. 
Customer: Achcha achcha to matlab payment vagera ka matlab kuch bhi aapne advance vagera kuch bhi nahi liya tha unse? 
Customer: Nahi inhone bola ki check lag chuka hai inhone solage vagera diye the madam ko. Hmm hmm hmm. Par wo bolti hai hamara audit hai aap material dispatch kar do maine check laga diya hai bank mein. To humne bhi trust pe bhej diya matlab jab tak baad mein bolti hai check to refund ho gaya wo matlab lagaiye. Ab check kaise refund hoga jab check unhone dal diya to check aa jata hai hamare paas dale nahi honge ya fir bounce ho gaya hoga. Check bounce hua kya hua. Unki side se hi hua. Fir us din ke baad 15 din ho gaye hai phone hi nahi utha rahe. Phone hi nahi utha rahe hain wo. Ha. Ek bar ye jo number hai isse baat kariye ga thik hai aur mere number pe call kar liye hote Goyal sir mera to number tha yaha pe matlab 96 pe kiye na to ticket concern yaha pe ho gaya hai. 
Customer: Ha ji ha ji. To ha ha ha to ye main apne inse close karta hu yaha se thik hai aapke paas mail jayega to uspe feedback dijiyega satisfied hamare liye hamare liye hota hai. Uske baad main mail kar deta hu aapka buyer supplier jo conflict hamara team hota hai na unko wo aapko connect karenge regarding iske thik hai. Thik hai. Jo bhi baat hoga unse bataiyega jo bhi detail mangegi aap unko de dijiyega to wo direct aapse buyer se baat karke jo bhi solution hoga wo nikal lenge thik hai wo sara cheez ya fir unka jo bhi agar nahi denge wo jo bhi hoga to unke paas jo bhi legal hoga wo sara hum log karte hain waha pe jo buyer supplier team hoti hai wo karti hai. To ye number diya main usse baat kariye ga thik hai aur baki jo ek bar main team se bol deta hu mail kar dunga wo aapse connect kar lenge uske regarding thik hai sir. Ab main yaha se close karta hu concern thik hai baki main inko aapke whatsapp pe connect kar lunga aapko thik hai sir. Okay sir okay. Thik hai sir good.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer hasn't received payment from buyer.

- Buyer is not answering calls.



Resolution:

- Executive provided alternate contact number for buyer.

- Executive will email buyer supplier conflict team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact buyer using new number.

- Buyer supplier conflict team will contact customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, buyleads, contact, buyer
